data.question: IRON MAN: What song plays at the beginning of the movie?
choices: Stairway to Heaven by Led Zeppelin

data.question: THE INCREDIBLE HULK: What does Tony tell Thaddeus Ross at the end of the film?
choices: That he wants to study The Hulk

data.question: IRON MAN 2: What fake name does Natasha use when she first meets Tony?

data.answer: The gave it to the collector

data.question: CAPTAIN AMERICA: CIVIL WAR: Who ISN'T on Iron Man's team?
